channel.title: The Run-Through with Vogue
channel.description: A new weekly podcast featuring the most riveting news in fashion and culture. The half-hour show celebrates a spirit of discovery, from Vogue’s unique take on the big stories to elevating undertold stories from around the globe. The Run-Through will cover the latest on red carpets and runways, peer into political and cultural events, and note remarkable triumphs of style.
channel.itunes:author: Vogue & Condé Nast
channel.itunes:summary: A new weekly podcast featuring the most riveting news in fashion and culture. The half-hour show celebrates a spirit of discovery, from Vogue’s unique take on the big stories to elevating undertold stories from around the globe. The Run-Through will cover the latest on red carpets and runways, peer into political and cultural events, and note remarkable triumphs of style.
channel.content:encoded: A new weekly podcast featuring the most riveting news in fashion and culture. The half-hour show celebrates a spirit of discovery, from Vogue’s unique take on the big stories to elevating undertold stories from around the globe. The Run-Through will cover the latest on red carpets and runways, peer into political and cultural events, and note remarkable triumphs of style.

item.title: Coming Soon! The Run-Through with Vogue
item.description: The Run-Through with Vogue is a new weekly podcast featuring the most riveting news in fashion and culture. Hosts Chioma Nnadi and Chloe Malle bring you their favorite headlines of the week, plus interviews with exclusive guests. You'll hear about Serena Williams' new normal, Micaela Coel's trip to Ghana with Vogue, Kirsten Gillibrand's second job as her teenage son's sneaker cleaner and listen to Chelsea Manning school Chloe and Chioma on fashion history. We'll cover everything from an intimate and shocking family reunion for model Natalia Vodianova to hearing about Oscar-winning costume designer Ruth Carter's visual world creation for Black Panther: Wakanda Forever and even head to the Avenue Montaigne in Paris to check out Simon Porte Jacquemus' first store--Chloe even samples the in-store popcorn machine! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.content:encoded:
The Run-Through with Vogue is a new weekly podcast featuring the most riveting news in fashion and culture. Hosts Chioma Nnadi and Chloe Malle bring you their favorite headlines of the week, plus interviews with exclusive guests. You'll hear about Serena Williams' new normal, Micaela Coel's trip to Ghana with Vogue, Kirsten Gillibrand's second job as her teenage son's sneaker cleaner and listen to Chelsea Manning school Chloe and Chioma on fashion history. We'll cover everything from an intimate and shocking family reunion for model Natalia Vodianova to hearing about Oscar-winning costume designer Ruth Carter's visual world creation for Black Panther: Wakanda Forever and even head to the Avenue Montaigne in Paris to check out Simon Porte Jacquemus' first store--Chloe even samples the in-store popcorn machine!
